Document.name: Clear
Document.summary: Clean all generated information from the last called to .
Document.param: Set to true so that only scopes for types in Workflow modules are deleted. Set to false to also delete scopes for cached global types. If there is no new reflectable native type that is registered after the last call to , using true for this argument saves times by reusing scopes created from global types.
Set to true to delete all added modules.
